title: EQT's growth fund to pursue deals of $50m-250m in India
description: EQT's $1.6 billion BPEA EQT Mid-Market Growth Partnership (MMG Fund) targets deals of $50 million-250 million in India, focusing on controlled investments in tech services, healthcare, and the financial sector, with a preference for single specialty hospitals, pharma, and diagnostics.
